diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Celiac disease, Crohn's disease, iron deficiency anemia, vitamin B12 deficiency
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient's presentation included worsening epigastric pain, nausea, vomiting, and nonbloody diarrhea over two weeks, alongside a history of pancreatitis-related symptoms. Imaging via MRCP showed pancreas divisum but no significant abnormalities indicating alternate pancreatitis causes, supporting the diagnosis of acute pancreatitis.
